item.title: Implemented top tasks
item.description: The Challenge One of the challenges content authors face is knowing what tasks and content resonate with our customers. For our McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (McAfee ePO) content, we wanted to find out what information was most valuable to our customers. We already had the usual infrormation about our website: page-views, bounce-rates, time-on-page, but we wanted to know if that information accurately reflected our customer’s needs and wants, and if there were any content gaps.
